alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:26PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima and south central Pinal Counties through 215 PM MST... At 126 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oro Valley, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Catalina, Oro Valley, Marana, Casas Adobes, Flowing Wells, Tortolita, Catalina State Park, Picture Rocks and Dove Mountain. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 235 and 251. Route 77 between mile markers 76 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
